title: 2021 Transition Patrol puts party in the back with all-new 160mm travel mullet
content:
Transition Bikes have given the Patrol enduro bike a hair cut, putting a balanced 160mm travel on a 27.5″ wheel in the rear and a 29″ wheel up front. The freeride contingent will be stoked to hear the 2021 Transition Patrol can also take a longer stroke shock and a dual-crown fork for dealing with […]

The post 2021 Transition Patrol puts party in the back with all-new 160mm travel mullet appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
